main event: An unidentified object was sighted in Jeffersonville, Indiana on April 14, 1960, appearing to be in a burning condition and changing colors.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 7-8 minutes, It displayed a jagged trail and ended with an explosion of color, The object changed shapes and colors throughout the observation, The witness thought it could be a balloon or aircraft, Two other witnesses saw the object while hitchhiking in Kentucky.
sighted object: a burning, color-changing object in the sky
